body.name: SAMSUNG Galaxy S8 Active 64GB SM-G892A at&T - Meteor Gray
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Best Deal Wireless Inc.
features: 5.8" Super AMOLED HD touch screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 5
body.description: The Samsung Galaxy S8 Active runs on Android OS v7.0 (Nougat) out of the box. It comes with a Li-Po 4000 mAh, non-removable battery. It features a 5.8 inches AMOLED display with 1440 x 2960 px resolution. The AMOLED technology is widely used for smartphones because of their gorgeous color reproduction abilities and very deep blacks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars S8 Active cellphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Samsung 8 Active
reviews.reviewText: Have carried my original 8A since 18. The battery started to swell, my husband's did the same thing a few months ago. I found a refurbished phone and got it for him. I found new ones here so bought 2. They came in the original packaging and are great phones. We are just hoping that at&t doesn't force 5G on us.This company was very fast to answer my questions in email and shipped the next day. Very Happy with everything. Highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for what I paid.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this used for $160. It was in excellent cosmetic condition, and the battery life is impressive compared to any other Samsung phone I have owned.The only flaw is a burned-in image at the top of the screen. It is almost impossible to see unless that portion of the screen is a light color, and I rarely notice it. I assume it was a display model in some store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Phone was awesome. But when I took it into at&t they told me it was registered as a stolen device.After couple quick emails with seller they got phone all sorted out and unlocked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: For the seller:Fast shippingMy phone was perfect, I thought it would have more wear and it pleasantly surprised me with how pristine it wasNo damage, everything works perfectlyRegarding S8 Active:Amazing purchase, best phone I've had.I had the S7 active for FOUR year. I only ever upgrade for large technical advantages. Since we hit a standstill in basic cellphone tech capabilities, cellphone companies are forced to play up their differences in between each cell version. They tweak things just a little so it feels different but at the core it is fundamentally the same. If you're looking for a sweet spot between "enough capablilty to keep up with culture" and "but don't want to keep paying more money for the same capabilities each new phone release" then this is perfect. Has every normal function a better than average smart phone does. Thick in hand, good grip, can take A LOT of damage and still be fine, puddles? You're good. Are you someone who has never grace and constantly fumbles things like me? No worries, your new s8 active has you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars you get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: the phone texts what it it wants and does strange things even deletes my pictures in weeks to have it relaced or repaired i have to be without a phone till its fixed, so just go to walmart and buy a cheap one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Advertised "NEW" But is used....
reviews.reviewText: 87%, but I kept 1 out of the 2 because I love the phone. The return process was quick though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent battery health
reviews.reviewText: As stated, the phone came in slightly used condition. A few dings in the edges. But the screen was in pristine shape as if it was replaced, the battery overall health was estimated at 88% as per accubattery, an app for android to help track battery capacity. All in all it came to me in better shape than Amazon's slcertified renewed guarentee and for 170$ this was a steal. Just wanna thank the seller as I just can't find a new s8 active anywhere anymore so near pristine used was the next best thing. One thing I recommend is to get a high quality charger once the phones gets to you as 3rd party chargers are unpredictable and can kill your battery over time if it's not a reputable company.
